comments: Very strict with grades. If it doesnt fit her requirements she will mark you down heavily. She requires discussion board posts every week and occasionally longer assignments. Her class is so much work and not worth the time. I spent more time on this class than my major classes. She also will not reason with you with any grade. Dont take her

stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: I took Introduction to Fiction online. It was a fine class, lots of reading and writing which is expected of English courses. Overall it was not too difficult and I did not feel I had to try too hard to get an A.

comments: Very Helpful teacher, she give you a lot of lee-way considering the language is being taught online. HIGHLY RECCOMEND!!
